title: FIT File: Google Pixel Watch Updates, Suunto + UTMB? Garmin vs Apple Ski Apps, and More SPD Power Meters
content:
﻿﻿﻿

For those not subscribed to the FIT File (it’s free!) via your regular podcast app or on YouTube, here’s a quick post with the highlights from the most recent episode.

In this episode, we talk about Google Pixel Watch Updates, Skiing Apps for Garmin and Apple, More SPD Power Meters, and other interesting news in the sports tech world.

Here are the timing/chapter markers for each (automatically in the YouTube video above, both on the YouTube video platform and the YouTube Music app for listening to podcasts):

0:00 Intro
0:57 Look Power Meter Pedals
23:13 Apple vs Garmin Ski Apps
35:22 Supersapiens Shuts Down
46:32 Google Pixel Watch Updates
52:42 Suunto and UTMB Partnership

As a reminder, here’s where you can find the podcast:

  • The FIT File on YouTube.

And then for the audio-only version, you can find it here:

  • Apple Podcasts
  • YouTube Music
  • Spotify
  • RSS Feed

Thanks for listening!
author: DC Rainmaker
